channel.title: story on Joshua's Diary
channel.description: Recent content in story on Joshua's Diary

item.title: Candyland
item.description: Once there was a doughnut called Officer Doughnut. He lived in a candy house with an ice cream. He lived on a candy planet to. He wanted a candy city. So he said “I need to build a candy city”. So he built and built and built until he finally finished. He got some friends to live with him too. BUT SOMEONE BROKE IT. So they investigated who could that be.
